Hero.description: Asymmetric split layout. Left: Bold typography, bio, CTA. Right: High-quality portrait with abstract data overlay.

News.description: Bento grid layout for recent updates. Mix of large feature cards and smaller list items.

Research.description: Card-based layout with glassmorphism effects. Each card highlights a research area with an icon and brief description.

Publications.description: Clean, filterable list. Use Shadcn Tabs for filtering by year/type. Each item should have a 'Cite' and 'PDF' button.

Teaching.description: Split layout or alternating rows. Course details on one side, relevant imagery on the other.

Lab.description: Grid of team member cards. Circular avatars, names, roles, and social links.

Contact.description: Simple, centered layout with a contact form and social links. Use a subtle map background or abstract pattern.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a 'Dark Academia Tech' aesthetic. Use deep slate backgrounds with electric blue accents.
Use 'Outfit' for all headings to give a modern, tech-forward feel. Use 'Inter' for body text for readability.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states (e.g., brightness-110, scale-105).
Use 'framer-motion' for scroll animations. Sections should fade in and slide up as the user scrolls.
The 'Publications' section must be functional. Mock the Google Scholar data structure.
Do NOT use generic 'AI' gradients. Use subtle, deep gradients or solid colors with noise textures if possible.
Ensure the site is fully responsive. Mobile navigation should be a clean hamburger menu.
Use Shadcn UI components for complex interactions (Tabs, Dialogs, Forms) but style them to match the 'Dark Academia' theme.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetics (generic centered layouts, excessive gradients).
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glassmorphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Do NOT apply universal transitions (e.g., 'transition: all').
Do NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles (pill-shaped or sharp).
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui.
